data.title: Intuitive Machines (LUNR) Stock Surges After Sharp Sell-Off: What's Going On?
data.description:
Intuitive Machines Inc (NASDAQ:LUNR) shares are trading higher Thursday, recovering some of the sharp losses seen in the previous session after the company unveiled sizable equity financing.

The move comes despite no fresh company-specific headlines, suggesting investors are reassessing Wednesday's sell-off and the implications of the deal for the space infrastructure firm.

Here’s what investors need to know.

  • Intuitive Machines stock is surging to new heights today. Why are LUNR shares rallying?

Capital Raise Funds Space Network Expansion

On Wednesday, LUNR sank after Intuitive Machines announced a $175 million strategic equity investment led by institutional investors, structured as an issuance of new Class A common stock.

The capital raise is intended to accelerate development of the company's Near Space Network Services and Lanteris satellite platforms, part of a broader effort to build a communications network connecting Earth orbit with the moon and, eventually, Mars.

Financing Fuels Growth, Adds Dilution Risk

While the financing supports Intuitive Machines' long-term growth ambitions and could help it secure more recurring government and commercial contracts, the offering introduces near-term dilution risk for existing shareholders and heightens the pressure on management to execute on complex lunar and deep-space projects.

Any delays, cost overruns or contract setbacks could weigh on future returns.

Late-2025 Breakout Lifts Moving Averages

Over the past year, Intuitive Machines has traded between a low of $6.48 and a high of $22.81, with shares spending much of 2025 oscillating around the $10–$13 area.

After moving mostly sideways through mid-2025, the stock broke out sharply late in the year, lifting the price and short-term moving averages above the longer-term 200-day trend line.

LUNR Earnings Due March

Intuitive Machines is slated to provide its next financial update on March 19.

  • EPS Estimate: Loss of 5 cents (Up from $-2.08)
  • Revenue Estimate: $53.34 million (Down from $54.66 million)

Buy Rating With Rising Targets

Analyst Consensus & Recent Actions: The stock carries a Buy Rating with an average price target of $18.00. Recent analyst moves include:

  • Keybanc: Overweight (Raises Target to $26.00) (Jan. 28)
  • Canaccord Genuity: Buy (Raises Target to $22.50) (Jan. 12)
  • Stifel: Downgraded to Hold (Raises Target to $20.00) (Jan. 9)

LUNR Shares Surge Thursday

LUNR Price Action: Intuitive Machines shares were up 10.76% at $17.61 at the time of publication on Thursday, according to Benzinga Pro data.

Image: Shutterstock

data.title: Here's How Much $1000 Invested In Sumitomo Mitsui Finl Gr 10 Years Ago Would Be Worth Today
data.description:
Sumitomo Mitsui Finl Gr (NYSE:SMFG) has outperformed the market over the past 10 years by 1.46% on an annualized basis producing an average annual return of 14.66%. Currently, Sumitomo Mitsui Finl Gr has a market capitalization of $144.45 billion.

Sumitomo Mitsui Finl Gr's Performance Over Last 10 Years

data.title: How To Trade SPY, QQQ, AAPL, MSFT, NVDA, GOOGL, META, TSLA Using Technical Analysis
data.description:
Good Morning Traders!

Today's economic calendar is moderate but meaningful as markets digest NVDA's earnings reaction and broader macro data. After reporting Q3 revenue growth of 62 percent year over year and strong forward margin guidance, NVDA initially surged above 200 in after hours trading before fading back toward flat, highlighting crowded positioning and elevated expectations. This dynamic will likely shape early tech sentiment. 

Initially, Jobless Claims provide a fresh read on labor market conditions. At 10:00AM ET, Fed Vice Chair for Supervision Michelle Bowman testifies before the Senate Banking Committee, which may generate regulatory or policy headlines. At 10:30AM ET, Natural Gas Inventories are released, followed by Kansas City Fed Manufacturing at 11:00AM ET. Treasury supply continues with Bill Announcements at 11:00AM ET, a 4 and 8 Week Bill Auction at 11:30AM ET, and a 7 Year Note Auction at 1:00PM ET. With earnings volatility intersecting with labor data and Treasury supply, expect sharp rotations and disciplined risk management throughout the session.

Now, we will discuss SPY, QQQ, AAPL, MSFT, NVDA, GOOGL, META, and TSLA.

SPDR S&P 500 ETF Trust (SPY)

SPY is currently trading around 692.75 as markets digest NVDA's volatile post earnings reaction and prepare for Jobless Claims at 8:30AM ET. If buyers defend this area, a push toward 695.00 may develop, followed by 697.25 if momentum builds into the mid morning session. Sustained strength above 699.50 would indicate expanding upside participation and could open the door toward 702.00 if yields remain stable. 

If SPY loses 692.75 with conviction, sellers may press into 690.50. A breakdown there could expose 688.25, and continued downside pressure may test 685.75. Watch how markets interpret NVDA's fade from above 200 back toward flat, as that tone could influence broader risk appetite.

Invesco QQQ Trust Series 1 (QQQ)

QQQ is currently trading around 616.00 and remains highly sensitive to NVDA's earnings reaction. Holding above this pivot may allow a move into 619.00, followed by 622.25 if growth names regain momentum. A break above 625.00 would signal strong upside continuation and potential re acceleration in tech leadership. 

If 616.00 fails to hold, sellers may guide price into 612.75. A sustained breakdown could bring 609.50 into focus, and deeper weakness may target 605.75. Tech volatility may expand as traders reassess semiconductor momentum following the after hours fade.

Apple Inc. (AAPL)

AAPL is currently trading around 274.25 and attempting to build structure above recent consolidation. If buyers defend this zone, a move toward 276.75 may develop, followed by 279.00 if broader tech firms. Sustained strength above 281.50 would reflect renewed institutional demand. 

If 274.25 breaks lower, sellers may test 272.00. A breakdown there could expose 269.75, and continued weakness may bring 267.25 into view. Apple's relative strength will help determine whether mega caps absorb NVDA-related volatility.

Microsoft Corp. (MSFT)

MSFT is currently trading around 399.25 and sitting just below the key 400 psychological level. If buyers reclaim 401.00 with strength, price may rotate toward 404.00, followed by 407.25 if upside momentum builds. A sustained push above 410.00 would signal structural repair in large cap tech. 

If 399.25 fails to hold, sellers may press into 396.50. Continued weakness could extend into 393.75, and deeper downside may test 390.50. Microsoft's reaction to broader growth flows will likely influence QQQ direction.

NVIDIA Corporation (NVDA)

NVDA is currently trading around 197.25 after an explosive initial reaction above 200 following earnings that saw revenue up 62 percent year over year and strong margin guidance. If buyers defend this pivot, a move back toward 200.00 may develop, followed by 204.50 if upside momentum resumes. Sustained strength above 207.00 would reflect renewed confidence in the Blackwell cycle narrative. 

If 197.25 breaks lower, sellers may test 193.75 quickly. A breakdown there could expose 190.50, and continued weakness may target 186.75. The fade from after hours highs suggests positioning is crowded, so expect elevated volatility throughout the session.

Alphabet Inc Class A (GOOGL)

GOOGL is currently trading around 311.75 and attempting to stabilize after recent swings. If buyers defend this zone, a move toward 314.25 may unfold, followed by 317.00 if communication services strengthen. A break above 319.75 would signal renewed upside momentum. 

If 311.75 fails, sellers may press into 308.75. A sustained breakdown could expose 305.50, and deeper weakness may target 302.75. Watch whether large cap tech rotates into relative strength away from semiconductors.

Meta Platforms Inc (META)

META is currently trading around 649.75 and maintaining relative stability despite semiconductor volatility. If buyers step in, price may rotate toward 653.50, followed by 657.25 if upside momentum expands. Sustained strength above 660.00 would indicate continued leadership. 

If 649.75 breaks down, sellers may guide price into 645.50. A deeper pullback could test 641.25, and continued weakness may bring 637.50 into focus. Relative strength here would signal resilience within growth.

Tesla Inc. (TSLA)

TSLA is currently trading around 415.00 and remains reactive to broader risk tone. If buyers defend this pivot, a push toward 419.25 may develop, followed by 423.50 if speculative participation builds. A breakout above 427.00 would signal expanding upside momentum. 

If 415.00 fails to hold, sellers may test 410.75. Continued downside pressure could extend into 406.50, and deeper weakness may bring 401.75 into view. Tesla often amplifies broader market volatility.

Final Word: Trade safely.

Benzinga Disclaimer: This article is from an unpaid external contributor. It does not represent Benzinga’s reporting and has not been edited for content or accuracy.

data.title: D-Wave Stock Rises Despite Q4 Double Miss: What You Need To Know
data.description:
D-Wave Quantum Inc. (NYSE:QBTS) reported financial results for the fourth quarter before the market open on Thursday. Here’s a look at the key highlights from the quarter.

  • D-Wave Quantum stock is building positive momentum. What’s pushing QBTS stock higher?

Earnings And Revenue Miss Offset By Bookings Surge, Record Liquidity

D-Wave reported an adjusted loss of 9 cents per share, missing the consensus estimate for a 7 cent-loss. In addition, the company reported revenue of $2.75 million, missing the consensus estimate of $3.75 million.

Fourth-quarter bookings totaled $13.4 million, up 471% from third-quarter bookings of $2.4 million. 

"Our 2025 results mark one of the most successful and transformative years in D-Wave’s history, with meaningful growth across every key business metric — revenue, Bookings, technical milestones, and scientific breakthroughs," said CEO Alan Baratz.

“We are entering 2026 with exceptional momentum: generating over $30 million in Bookings in January alone, expanding our market leadership through the acquisition of gate-model quantum computing company Quantum Circuits, Inc., and securing an eight-figure enterprise QCaaS agreement that underscores growing customer confidence in our technology’s power to transform enterprise operations.”

D-Wave reported a record consolidated cash and marketable investment securities balance of $884.5 million, representing a 397% increase from the prior year’s quarter. During the period, the company raised $63.7 million in cash proceeds from the exercise of warrants.

D-Wave Stock Trades Higher

QBTS Price Action: At the time of writing, D-Wave shares are trading 7.12% higher at $21.05, according to data from Benzinga Pro.

Image via Shutterstock

data.title: Earnings Outlook For inTest
data.description:
inTest (AMEX:INTT) is set to give its latest quarterly earnings report on Friday, 2026-02-27. Here's what investors need to know before the announcement.

Analysts estimate that inTest will report an earnings per share (EPS) of $0.13.

Investors in inTest are eagerly awaiting the company's announcement, hoping for news of surpassing estimates and positive guidance for the next quarter.

It's worth noting for new investors that stock prices can be heavily influenced by future projections rather than just past performance.

Past Earnings Performance

In the previous earnings release, the company missed EPS by $0.06, leading to a 7.54% drop in the share price the following trading session.

Here's a look at inTest's past performance and the resulting price change:

inTest Share Price Analysis

Shares of inTest were trading at $10.22 as of February 25. Over the last 52-week period, shares are up 19.76%. Given that these returns are generally positive, long-term shareholders are likely bullish going into this earnings release.

Unveiling the Story Behind inTest

inTest's Financial Performance

Market Capitalization Analysis: Falling below industry benchmarks, the company's market capitalization reflects a reduced size compared to peers. This positioning may be influenced by factors such as growth expectations or operational capacity.

Decline in Revenue: Over the 3 months period, inTest faced challenges, resulting in a decline of approximately -13.33% in revenue growth as of 30 September, 2025. This signifies a reduction in the company's top-line earnings. In comparison to its industry peers, the company trails behind with a growth rate lower than the average among peers in the Information Technology sector.

Net Margin: inTest's net margin surpasses industry standards, highlighting the company's exceptional financial performance. With an impressive -3.58% net margin, the company effectively manages costs and achieves strong profitability.

Return on Equity (ROE): inTest's ROE surpasses industry standards, highlighting the company's exceptional financial performance. With an impressive -0.92% ROE, the company effectively utilizes shareholder equity capital.

Return on Assets (ROA): inTest's ROA surpasses industry standards, highlighting the company's exceptional financial performance. With an impressive -0.63% ROA, the company effectively utilizes its assets for optimal returns.

Debt Management: inTest's debt-to-equity ratio is below the industry average. With a ratio of 0.18, the company relies less on debt financing, maintaining a healthier balance between debt and equity, which can be viewed positively by investors.

To track all earnings releases for inTest visit their earnings calendar on our site.
